video.title: Rake
video.synopsis: While Cleaver Greene is a brilliant and driven attorney, he's also an ex-druggie, a current gambling addict and loathed by many of his colleagues.

episodes.synopsis: Cleaver is presented with a case he can't resist when a world-renowned economist is accused of cannibalism.
episodes.title: R v Murray

episodes.synopsis: Cleaver and Barney take on the case of a woman who made headlines by seducing a juror for information after her daughter was found guilty of murder.
episodes.title: R v Marx

episodes.synopsis: A bad day only gets worse when Cleaver is confronted with a front-page story calling his nemesis David Potter a hero.
episodes.title: R v Dana

episodes.synopsis: Cleaver takes on a case defending a once-famous but now homeless artist who is accused of murdering a 15-year-old male prostitute in a city back lane.
episodes.title: R v Lorton

episodes.synopsis: A doctor's life is turned upside down when his briefcase is stolen and a very incriminating DVD finds its way to the local police.
episodes.title: R v Chandler

episodes.synopsis: Attorney General Joe Sandilands is ambushed in a radio interview by a shock jock about gang violence and the rape of a young girl.
episodes.title: R v Langhorn

episodes.synopsis: As Barney starts to rebound from his recent marriage woes, Joe Sandilands is named as one of the MPs who patronise Club Jules.
episodes.title: R v Tanner

episodes.synopsis: At one of their regular swingers' parties, Mick Corella's wife, Kirsty, runs into an old school friend, who is found dead the next day.
episodes.title: R v Corella

episodes.synopsis: Never out of the headlines for long, Cleaver is caught having an affair with the premier of New South Wales, making himself an enemy of her husband.
episodes.title: R v Mohammed

episodes.synopsis: Cleaver's affair with the premier is proving costly when her husband, Attorney General Cal McGregor, begins a campaign of harassment against him.
episodes.title: R v Fenton

episodes.synopsis: Missy's book about her life as a prostitute has caused a sensation, with everyone in town speculating about who the characters really are.
episodes.title: R v Woolgridge & Anor

episodes.synopsis: Having been ditched by Barney, a bitter Cleaver represents a peeping tom and laments the lack of cases coming his way.
episodes.title: R v Floyd

episodes.synopsis: Missy is on trial for murdering her fiancé. The only way Cleaver can save her is to expose the conspiracy to murder Joshua.
episodes.title: R v Turner

episodes.synopsis: Cleaver and Barney defend a man accused of severing his neighbour's penis with garden shears after an escalating dispute over a birthday party.
episodes.title: R v Alford

episodes.synopsis: Scarlet and David's affair is front-page news, and Scarlet is terrified of the disapproval of the private school mothers.
episodes.title: Green v Hole

episodes.synopsis: Cleaver is in prison, charged with the manslaughter of Lane Hole's sweet, elderly neighbour. He is bailed out by Missy, suddenly flush with funds.
episodes.title: R v Green
